tasks.title: Build Audit Logs System for Actions
tasks.description: Immutable log system for every action the agent takes (Email sent, Meeting booked).

tasks.title: Implement Citation Layer (Return References with Response)
tasks.description: Backend support for returning source citations (documents, CRM records) alongside the LLM response.

tasks.title: Implement Interruption Handling (Barge-in) Logic
tasks.description: Implement silence detection and interruption handling so the agent stops speaking immediately when the user talks.

tasks.title: Optimize Voice Latency (<500ms) for Hebrew
tasks.description: Technical optimization for voice agent latency. WebSocket tuning, Caching, Edge functions.

tasks.title: Design Data Isolation Sandbox for Enterprise
tasks.description: Architecture to ensure strict data separation between tenants/customers to prevent leakage.
